snippet: Paula Broadwell, who had an affair with the director of the C.I.A., holds a graduate degree from Harvard, and was a fitness champion at West Point, as well as a model for a machine gun manufacturer.
abstract: Paula Broadwell, whose adulterous affair with Central Intelligence Agency director David Petraeus led to his resignation, is lifelong high achiever who holds graduate degree from Harvard and was fitness champion at West Point; some suggest those qualities are what drew Petraeus's attention.
lead_paragraph: Paula Broadwell, who had an affair with the director of the C.I.A., holds a graduate degree from Harvard, and was a fitness champion at West Point, as well as a model for a machine gun manufacturer.

headline.seo: Linked to Petraeus, Paula Broadwell Is Lifelong High Achiever
headline.main: Woman Linked to Petraeus Is a West Point Graduate and Lifelong High Achiever
